Thank you for your recent inquiry.
LegalZoom can assist you in preparing and filing a provisional application for patent. The total cost including government fees is $309.00.
A provisional application for patent establishes your priority with a "date of invention." The reason it's so important to file a provisional application is because Patent Law does not recognize the person who came up with the idea first, but the person who files the patent application first.
The advantage of a provisional application for patent is that it's much faster and easier to file than a standard patent application. A standard patent application can take months to prepare and can cost $5,000 or more. With a provisional application for patent, you will have 12 months to file a corresponding non-provisional utility patent application and you can legally announce to the world, "Patent pending."
